version_description:
Merci d'utiliser l'application beIN SPORTS CONNECT !
Nous améliorions sans cesse notre application et vous proposons régulièrement des mises à jour dans l'App Store. Chaque nouvelle mise à jour comprend des corrections mineures de performance et de fiabilité.

Nous vous tiendrons également informé ici des nouvelles fonctionnalités dès leur sortie.

A whole new app for the USA! Watch LIVE anywhere, anytime the world’s biggest international sports.

A whole new app for the USA! Watch LIVE anywhere, anytime the world’s biggest international sports.
We update our app regularly to enhance and enrich the experience of using beIN CONNECT. This update brings some minor performance enhancements and bugfixes.
We update our app regularly to enhance and enrich the experience of using beIN CONNECT. This update brings some minor performance enhancements and bugfixes.

At beIN SPORTS we are always working on improving the beIN SPORTS CONNECT live streaming app. Every update we release includes new features, bug fixes and performance enhancements, better security and reliability.

In this release:
- Improved EPG/TV Guide
- "LIVE" view enriched with programming listings
- Bug fixes

At beIN SPORTS we are always working on improving the beIN SPORTS CONNECT live streaming app. Every update we release includes new features, bug fixes and performance enhancements, better security and reliability.

In this release:
- Improved EPG/TV Guide
- "LIVE" view enriched with programming listings
- Bug fixes
- Bug fixes and performance enhancements
- Bug fixes and performance enhancements

We regularly update our apps to fine tune the experience, patch bugs and add new features. With this release, enjoy a superb live match experience for the UEFA Champions League and the UEFA Europa League thanks to XTRA Live.

XTRA Live allows beIN SPORTS CONNECT subscribers to tap into a cutting-edge dashboard of immersive streaming experience giving users ability to watch the game via multi-cameras, replay goals, read minute-by-minute live commentary and keep up with the latest live match center analysis.

3D Touch support:
- From the TV Guide, 3D touch (or long press) to add a program to your calendar
- Quick actions from the Home screen take you straight to a Live event, the TV Guide or the On Demand section!
